Class Board

  • java.lang.Object

  • public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
    The class board represents a player's board.

        Parameters:

      • canPlaceShip

        public boolean canPlaceShip(Ship ship)
        Returns true if able to place ship on player's board false otherwise.
        Parameters:
        ship - ship object
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - in position of ship in invalid. Position is invalid if either of the coordinate is negative, or greater than or equal to the size of the board.
